entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Camrose
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Camrose 7:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -27.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
